title: Acadia National Park: Shipwrecks
body: Shipwrecks         Abandoned vessel, Great Cranberry Island   The waters around Mount Desert Island are littered with shipwrecks. If you're looking for more information about vessels lost or discarded in these waters, check out the Acadia Maritime Cultural Resources Inventory. The park uses this information to manage areas with potential maritime cultural resources. Acadia Maritime Cultural Resources Inventory (3.2MB PDF) January 2009 Franklin H. Price, Joshua Daniel, Kristen Chasse, and John Stallings
